statements: SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorTracking;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorTracking WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorTracking ORDER BY behavior_type ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM UserBehaviorTracking GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorTracking WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp, page_visited FROM UserBehaviorTracking WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorTracking WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorTracking WHERE page_visited LIKE '%home%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM UserBehaviorTracking GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_visits > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorTracking WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, page_visited FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE page_visited = 'homepage';
SELECT user_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT product_id, recommendation, relevance_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE relevance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY relevance_score DESC;
SELECT product_id, recommendation FROM product_recommendations WHERE product_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT user_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM user_behavior_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE page_visited = 'homepage' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM user_behavior_tracking WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY;
SELECT product_id, recommendation, relevance_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE relevance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY relevance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, referral_source FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'technology';
SELECT product_id, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT product_id, recommendation_timestamp FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommended_by_user = 500;
SELECT user_id, event_id, event_timestamp FROM user_behavior ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, page_visited, referral_source FROM user_behavior WHERE referral_source = 'Google'
SELECT user_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Product' ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, page_visited, event_timestamp FROM user_behavior JOIN user_preferences ON user_behavior.user_id = user_preferences.user_id
SELECT product_id, recommendation_score, recommendation_timestamp FROM product_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM recommendations ORDER BY rating DESC, recommended_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, r.rating FROM products p JOIN recommendations r ON p.product_id = r.product_id;
SELECT u.name, COUNT(*) AS view_count FROM users u JOIN page_views pv ON u.user_id = pv.user_id GROUP BY u.name ORDER BY view_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, brand_preference FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT timestamp, page_visited FROM VisitHistory WHERE duration_seconds > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_name, recommendation_type FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'popular' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE event_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, event_type, product_id, interaction_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, category_preference, brand_preference FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price, brand FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT r.user_id, r.product_id, r.timestamp, r.recommendation_type, p.product_name FROM Recommendations r JOIN Product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.recommendation_type = 'personalized' ORDER BY r.timestamp DESC LIMIT 7;
